REPORT.name: Прибыль по тарифам
REPORT.description: Распределение прибыли по тарифам --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code: select Tarifs.[name] as [Тариф], sum(Sessions.[CommonPay]) as [Сумма] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (Sessions.[id] = SessionsAdd.[idSessions]) inner join Tarifs on (SessionsAdd.[idTarif] = Tarifs.[id]) where sessions.[started] > %TIME-START% and sessions.[started] < %TIME-STOP% group by Tarifs.[name]
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
